issue.title: [C++] Bump version of bundled AWS SDK
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16727](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16727). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The latest version on the 1.8 line is 1.8.186.
We could also try to switch to the 1.9 line, but there were blocking issues last time we tried.

Note we should bump the dependent AWS library versions at the same time.
